data.text: Naama ziɛgi zu Ezekiase zeeɓɛni, é ɠɛnina zaazu. Amɔse ná-doun zunui Ezayi, GALA goo wo nui liini pɔ bɛ, é ɠɛ ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa: ‹Ɗa-vaiti gaaɠula ba, é devei yɛ ɗa-ʋɛlɛyeɠei ya, tɔɔzei ɗa ga za, è la ɠulazu seeɓɛi nii zu.› »
Ezekiase ɠaaʋoteni pɛlɛi ma, é Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maanɛɛnɛni ɠani:
«Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, soma è ɠizɛ su ga sìɛʋɛ è ɠaazu ga wooɠɛɠiladai ta ɠi pagɔlai, gè naa ɠɛ nii pagai è ɠaazu.» Naa ʋoluma Ezekiase wɔlɔni, gaazuɗɛi ʋu ga gola.
Ezayi la ɠɛni dɛ ɠulani koi zaamaʋɛ ʋa, eyɛsu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɛ pɔ, é ɠɛ ma:

«Ɠale ma Ezekiase ʋɔ bɛ, nà-nuɓusɛiti ta-lotuɠɔi, è ɠɛ ma: ‹È-mɛmɛwola Davide ná-GALAGI, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa: Gè ɗa-maanɛɛnɛ wooi mɛniga, gè è-ɠaazuɗɛi ɠaa. Nà è ɠɛdɛsu, lina ɠa leʋena ɗa zoo è li Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi ma ɠoizuʋɛ.
Gè kona puugɔ maazu lɔɔlugɔ (15) ʋiliga è-zii zu. Ɗa-o, taai nii-yo, nà wo unmɔɔsu, gè wo ɠula Asiili masagi ya, nà taai nii makɛ nà ɓɔɠɔi nà-faa zu ta nà-botiɠɛ nui Davide ná-faa zu.› »
Ezayi ɠɛni ti ma: «À kooleɠoolegi ɠaawaai ɠaayɔgai zeɠe.» Ti seɠeni, ti pu masagi ná-wologi ɠa, é ɠɛdɛ.
Ezekiase Ezayi ɠaazaɠani, é ɠɛ ma: «Poogi ɓɛgele ɠa nà kwɛɛ da ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa kɛ̀dɛsu, ta nà zoo gè li Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi ma ɠoizuʋɛ lina ɠa leʋena?»

Ezayi gooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Poogi ʋɛtɛ nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI feezu è ya, è ʋa kwɛɛ da ga toɠa ná-minazeɠegi laazeelizu nii é kɛai è ʋɛ: Ɗa pɔ ga niinigi li luɠɔ ga kɔɠɔ losu puugɔ, ɓaa é ɠula ʋolu ga kɔɠɔ losu puugɔ?»
Ezekiase gooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «É la ɓaani ga niinigi li luɠɔ ga kɔɠɔ losu puugɔ, é ʋa zeeli kula vai zu ga ʋoluʋelei. É ɠula ʋolu tɔun ga kɔɠɔ losu puugɔ.»
GALA goo wo nui Ezayi Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maanɛɛnɛni, naa niinigi ɠula ʋolu ga kɔɠɔ losu puugɔ, Aɠaze ná-kɔɠɔ losuʋɛ, ʋɛ é yeini ná niina.
Naama yeeɠɛɠalai nɔ, Ɓaɓilɔne masagi Melodake-Ɓaladan, Ɓaladan ná-doun zunui, mɛnini ga Ezekiase zeeɓɛni. É keelaiti teʋeni ma, sɛʋɛi ti ya ta sabaliʋai.

Ezekiase yeezeini ti wu, naa ʋoluma é pɛlɛi wu lɛɛni ga tiye, ʋɛ ná ga ani ɓiigiti makɛsuʋɛ, walii ta zanugi ta tufa maku nɛɛnɛgiti, ta gulɔ maku nɛɛnɛgi. É ná-kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔlaiti puuzuʋɛ ɓalaa lɛ, ta nii kpein makɛga ɠɛni de zea. É la ɠɛni ani nɔpɛ dɔɔɠuni ti ʋa ná-pɛlɛi wu, ta ná-masa zooi zu.

Naa ʋoluma GALA goo wo nui Ezayi ʋaani masagi Ezekiase ʋɔ bɛ, é gaazaɠa, é ɠɛ ma: «Leeni ɠa niima nuiti ti bogai, mini mu ka ti zeɠeai ná?» Ezekiase gooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Ti zeɠeʋɛ ada ɠooza, Ɓaɓilɔne.»
Ezayi ɠɛni ma ʋolu: «Leeni ɠa ti kaai ɗa-ʋɛlɛi wu?» Ezekiase ɠɛ ma: «Ti anii kpein kaaʋɛ nà-pɛlɛi wu, ani nɔpɛ gè la yɛni ʋoluzu nà-naavolo makɛsuʋɛ, nii gè la dɛɛni ga tiye.»
Ezayi ɠɛni Ezekiase ma naazu: «Woilo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ma:
‹Foloi tanigaa ta ʋaazu, nii kpein é ɗa-ʋɛlɛi wu, nii è-mɛmɛwolani ti gaalɛai ba, eyɛsu za zeeli, ta li ga ti pɛ Ɓaɓilɔne, gila kpalaa ge la yɛga ʋoluzu.› » Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é boga.
« ‹Ta li ga è-mavofodai tanigaani, ti ɠɛ ga botiɠɛ nu wolaiti Ɓaɓilɔne masagi ná-pɛlɛi wu.› »
Ezekiase Ezayi wooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI laawooi ʋagɛ nii è bogai mà.» Mazɔlɔɔ é ɠɛni ɠɛɛzu ma: «Kɛbɛ tɔun ziilɛigi ta makɛi ɠa ɠɛ ade ʋɛ sìi ma voloi pɛ su, kɛlɛ?»
Ezekiase ná-fai mɔtaiti ta ná-tɔɠɔɠula faiti, ta ʋelei é ziɛ makɛsuʋɛ ɓɛtɛni la, zeɠei é bɔɔni ga é lɛ ga ziɛi taazuʋɛ, naati sɛʋɛʋɛ Zuda masagiti ta-ɠɛɛwoti zɛʋɛi zu.
Ezekiase zaani. Ná-doun zunui Manasé ɠa é masadai ɠɛɛni potogi zu.
